name: Aurora (itch) (Brightlight studios)
description:
This is the GMTK version I only had 2 days to make but still extremely fun and hard to play. You can finish the game in 5 minutes (I dare all speed runners) or you can be the average person and finish it in 1 hour to 1 month depending on your skill to be able to control a ball with reckless controls and ever-changing camera. Just play and you'll get what I mean. 

This is designed to keep you indoors (not that you have a choice) and it's fun or frustrating.

PLAY IT NOW AND STOP WASTING TIME

Also there will be a reward for losing, right?????

I hope I make it to Mark Brown's top 20 

And finally by the time you finish reading the sentence you must have realized that it has nothing meaningful to say and a complete waste of your time.

Good day or Night ???????

Please donate to support me.
